flawed_nl_solution:
Phoebe is having 20 guests and Monica charges $25 per person so that’s 20*25 = $<<20*25=5000>>5000
Phoebe is a repeat customer so she gets 10% off of $5000 so that’s 0.1*5000 = $<<10*0.01*5000=500>>500 discount
Monica is charging $5000 minus the repeat customer discount of $500 so she will make 5000-500 = $<<5000-500=4500>>4500
#### 4500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
